title: Where is my Star Guardian Jhin?
body: Why are there no male Star Guardians? I don't want one of questionable sexual orientation (Leave Taric out of this pls). I want a legitimate, overbearingly male Star Guardian, and Jhin is be perfect for that. Speaking of Jhin, why do he and ASol still have no new Skins? I would have gladly skipped the whole doom bots event with the nth Teemo skin, for a Jhin, ASol, Illaoi, Taliyah, Ivern or Kled skin.

replies.body: it should be star guardian urgot

Jhin just got a new blood moon skin, and all of the champs you mentioned are the new ones. Creating skins is a creative process as much as a dev one and they take time. Newer champs with only one skin are high on the priority list sure, but ultimately if they don't have a good skin concept they can't create a skin. They'll be done when they're done essentially. X other champion getting a skin doesn't mean that y priority champion won't get one, it just means x champion has a concept that's made it through the dev process and y doesn't yet.

A male doesn't make sense for the star guardians.

If you knew the reference you would understand.

what are you talking about? the whole concepts of star guardians came from star bishounens. 

You cannot deny the facts, magical girls and boys are a disturbing staple of anime.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B5NTMFraP2Y

Star Guardian Ezreal coming out soon :)
